SELECT stockItem.`id` AS id, stockItem.`item_number` AS itemNumber, stockItem.`name` AS name, stockItem.`assistant_code` AS assistantCode, stockItem.`tag_id` AS tagId, tag.`name` AS tagName, stockItem.`specifications` AS specifications, stockItem.`storage_quantity` AS storageQuantity, stockItem.`cost_card_unit_id` AS costCardUnitId, unit.`name` AS costCardName, stockItem.`upper_quantity` AS upperQuantity, stockItem.`lower_quantity` AS lowerQuantity, stockItem.`remark`AS remark, stockItem.`stock_out_type` AS stockOutType, stockItem.`status` AS status, stockItem.`created_time` AS createdTime, stockItem.`last_modified_time` AS lastModifiedTime FROM `t_stock_item`stockItem LEFT JOIN `t_tag`tag ON tag.`id` = stockItem.`tag_id` LEFT JOIN `t_unit`unit ON stockItem.`cost_card_unit_id` = unit.`id`
stockItem.`status` = 1
AND ( stockItem.`name` LIKE "%"#{searchDto.keyword}"%" OR stockItem.`item_number` LIKE "%"#{searchDto.keyword}"%" OR stockItem.`assistant_code` LIKE "%"#{searchDto.keyword}"%" )
AND stockItem.`tag_id` IN
#{tagId}
ORDER BY stockItem.`tag_id` ASC ,stockItem.`id` ASC
LIMIT #{searchDto.offset}, #{searchDto.pageSize}

SELECT stockItem.`id` AS id, stockItem.`item_number` AS itemNumber, stockItem.`name` AS name, stockItem.`assistant_code` AS assistantCode, stockItem.`tag_id` AS tagId, tag.`name` AS tagName, stockItem.`specifications` AS specifications, stockItem.`storage_quantity` AS storageQuantity, stockItem.`cost_card_unit_id` AS costCardUnitId, unit.`name` AS costCardName, stockItem.`upper_quantity` AS upperQuantity, stockItem.`lower_quantity` AS lowerQuantity, stockItem.`remark`AS remark, stockItem.`stock_out_type` AS stockOutType, stockItem.`status` AS status, stockItem.`created_time` AS createdTime, stockItem.`last_modified_time` AS lastModifiedTime FROM `t_stock_item`stockItem LEFT JOIN `t_tag`tag ON tag.`id` = stockItem.`tag_id` LEFT JOIN `t_unit`unit ON stockItem.`cost_card_unit_id` = unit.`id` WHERE stockItem.`status` = 1 ORDER BY stockItem.`tag_id` ASC ,stockItem.`id` ASC
LIMIT #{offset}, #{pageSize}
